title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 

(Minister of State at the Department of Health) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department health) order 2022

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: 2. Darren Hourihane, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
2. Darren Hourihane, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Health, Block 1, Miesian Plaza, 50-58 Lower 
Baggot Street, Dublin 2 is appointed to be a Special Adviser to Mary Butler, 
Minister of State at the Department of Health, on a temporary basis, with effect 
from 28 February 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

24 May, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 27th May, 2022 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [266] 3

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

The purpose of this Order is to appoint a Special Adviser to Mary Butler, 
Minister of State at the Department of Health on a temporary basis. 

 4 [266]
